thread.section_title: Fresh Start Law Center Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fresh Start Law Center | freshstartlawcenter.com
thread.title: Donald
thread.title_full: Fresh Start Law Center reviewed by Donald

author: Donald
title: Donald
text: I highly recommend David at Fresh Start Law Center. He just completed a reduction/expungement for me and made the process quick and hassle free. Any questions I did have were answered super fast, he kept me well informed the whole time which was only about 2 months from the time I first contacted him to me getting the good news. His rates are excellent with no hidden fees or surprises. I just received the approved reduction/expungement last night and am still a little in shock just how affordable, simple and fast David made this for me. Hire him, you will not regret it.
